description: Gets the details of a data quality monitoring job definition.

parameters.name: JobDefinitionName
parameters.description: The name of the data quality monitoring job definition to describe.

nested_items.name: JobDefinitionArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the data quality monitoring job definition.

nested_items.name: JobDefinitionName
nested_items.description: The name of the data quality monitoring job definition.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The time that the data quality monitoring job definition was created.

nested_items.name: DataQualityBaselineConfig
nested_items.description: The constraints and baselines for the data quality monitoring job definition.

nested_items.name: BaseliningJobName
nested_items.description: The name of the job that performs baselining for the data quality monitoring job.

nested_items.name: ConstraintsResource
nested_items.description: The constraints resource for a monitoring job.

nested_items.name: S3Uri
nested_items.description: The Amazon S3 URI for the constraints resource.

nested_items.name: StatisticsResource
nested_items.description: The statistics resource for a monitoring job.

nested_items.name: S3Uri
nested_items.description: The Amazon S3 URI for the statistics resource.

nested_items.name: DataQualityAppSpecification
nested_items.description: Information about the container that runs the data quality monitoring job.

nested_items.name: ImageUri
nested_items.description: The container image that the data quality monitoring job runs.

nested_items.name: ContainerEntrypoint
nested_items.description: The entrypoint for a container used to run a monitoring job.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: ContainerArguments
nested_items.description: The arguments to send to the container that the monitoring job runs.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: RecordPreprocessorSourceUri
nested_items.description: An Amazon S3 URI to a script that is called per row prior to running analysis. It can base64 decode the payload and convert it into a flattened JSON so that the built-in container can use the converted data. Applicable only for the built-in (first party) containers.

nested_items.name: PostAnalyticsProcessorSourceUri
nested_items.description: An Amazon S3 URI to a script that is called after analysis has been performed. Applicable only for the built-in (first party) containers.

nested_items.name: Environment
nested_items.description: Sets the environment variables in the container that the monitoring job runs.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: DataQualityJobInput
nested_items.description: The list of inputs for the data quality monitoring job. Currently endpoints are supported.

nested_items.name: EndpointInput
nested_items.description: Input object for the endpoint.

nested_items.name: EndpointName
nested_items.description: An endpoint in customer's account which has enabled DataCaptureConfig enabled.

nested_items.name: LocalPath
nested_items.description: Path to the filesystem where the endpoint data is available to the container.

nested_items.name: S3InputMode
nested_items.description: Whether the Pipe or File is used as the input mode for transferring data for the monitoring job. Pipe mode is recommended for large datasets. File mode is useful for small files that fit in memory. Defaults to File.

nested_items.name: S3DataDistributionType
nested_items.description: Whether input data distributed in Amazon S3 is fully replicated or sharded by an Amazon S3 key. Defaults to FullyReplicated.

nested_items.name: FeaturesAttribute
nested_items.description: The attributes of the input data that are the input features.

nested_items.name: InferenceAttribute
nested_items.description: The attribute of the input data that represents the ground truth label.

nested_items.name: ProbabilityAttribute
nested_items.description: In a classification problem, the attribute that represents the class probability.

nested_items.name: ProbabilityThresholdAttribute
nested_items.description: The threshold for the class probability to be evaluated as a positive result.

nested_items.name: StartTimeOffset
nested_items.description: If specified, monitoring jobs substract this time from the start time. For information about using offsets for scheduling monitoring jobs, see Schedule Model Quality Monitoring Jobs.

nested_items.name: EndTimeOffset
nested_items.description: If specified, monitoring jobs substract this time from the end time. For information about using offsets for scheduling monitoring jobs, see Schedule Model Quality Monitoring Jobs.

nested_items.name: ExcludeFeaturesAttribute
nested_items.description: The attributes of the input data to exclude from the analysis.

nested_items.name: BatchTransformInput
nested_items.description: Input object for the batch transform job.

nested_items.name: DataCapturedDestinationS3Uri
nested_items.description: The Amazon S3 location being used to capture the data.

nested_items.name: DatasetFormat
nested_items.description: The dataset format for your batch transform job.

nested_items.name: Header
nested_items.description: Indicates if the CSV data has a header.

nested_items.name: Line
nested_items.description: Indicates if the file should be read as a JSON object per line.

nested_items.name: LocalPath
nested_items.description: Path to the filesystem where the batch transform data is available to the container.

nested_items.name: S3InputMode
nested_items.description: Whether the Pipe or File is used as the input mode for transferring data for the monitoring job. Pipe mode is recommended for large datasets. File mode is useful for small files that fit in memory. Defaults to File.

nested_items.name: S3DataDistributionType
nested_items.description: Whether input data distributed in Amazon S3 is fully replicated or sharded by an S3 key. Defaults to FullyReplicated.

nested_items.name: FeaturesAttribute
nested_items.description: The attributes of the input data that are the input features.

nested_items.name: InferenceAttribute
nested_items.description: The attribute of the input data that represents the ground truth label.

nested_items.name: ProbabilityAttribute
nested_items.description: In a classification problem, the attribute that represents the class probability.

nested_items.name: ProbabilityThresholdAttribute
nested_items.description: The threshold for the class probability to be evaluated as a positive result.

nested_items.name: StartTimeOffset
nested_items.description: If specified, monitoring jobs substract this time from the start time. For information about using offsets for scheduling monitoring jobs, see Schedule Model Quality Monitoring Jobs.

nested_items.name: EndTimeOffset
nested_items.description: If specified, monitoring jobs subtract this time from the end time. For information about using offsets for scheduling monitoring jobs, see Schedule Model Quality Monitoring Jobs.

nested_items.name: ExcludeFeaturesAttribute
nested_items.description: The attributes of the input data to exclude from the analysis.

nested_items.name: DataQualityJobOutputConfig
nested_items.description: The output configuration for monitoring jobs.

nested_items.name: MonitoringOutputs
nested_items.description: Monitoring outputs for monitoring jobs. This is where the output of the periodic monitoring jobs is uploaded.

nested_items.name: S3Uri
nested_items.description: A URI that identifies the Amazon S3 storage location where Amazon SageMaker AI saves the results of a monitoring job.

nested_items.name: LocalPath
nested_items.description: The local path to the Amazon S3 storage location where Amazon SageMaker AI saves the results of a monitoring job. LocalPath is an absolute path for the output data.

nested_items.name: S3UploadMode
nested_items.description: Whether to upload the results of the monitoring job continuously or after the job completes.

nested_items.name: KmsKeyId
nested_items.description: The Key Management Service (KMS) key that Amazon SageMaker AI uses to encrypt the model artifacts at rest using Amazon S3 server-side encryption.

nested_items.name: JobResources
nested_items.description: Identifies the resources to deploy for a monitoring job.

nested_items.name: ClusterConfig
nested_items.description: The configuration for the cluster resources used to run the processing job.

nested_items.name: InstanceCount
nested_items.description: The number of ML compute instances to use in the model monitoring job. For distributed processing jobs, specify a value greater than 1. The default value is 1.

nested_items.name: InstanceType
nested_items.description: The ML compute instance type for the processing job.

nested_items.name: VolumeSizeInGB
nested_items.description: The size of the ML storage volume, in gigabytes, that you want to provision. You must specify sufficient ML storage for your scenario.

nested_items.name: VolumeKmsKeyId
nested_items.description: The Key Management Service (KMS) key that Amazon SageMaker AI uses to encrypt data on the storage volume attached to the ML compute instance(s) that run the model monitoring job.

nested_items.name: NetworkConfig
nested_items.description: The networking configuration for the data quality monitoring job.

nested_items.name: EnableInterContainerTrafficEncryption
nested_items.description: Whether to encrypt all communications between the instances used for the monitoring jobs. Choose True to encrypt communications. Encryption provides greater security for distributed jobs, but the processing might take longer.

nested_items.name: EnableNetworkIsolation
nested_items.description: Whether to allow inbound and outbound network calls to and from the containers used for the monitoring job.

nested_items.name: VpcConfig
nested_items.description: Specifies an Amazon Virtual Private Cloud (VPC) that your SageMaker jobs, hosted models, and compute resources have access to. You can control access to and from your resources by configuring a VPC. For more information, see Give SageMaker Access to Resources in your Amazon VPC.

nested_items.name: SecurityGroupIds
nested_items.description: The VPC security group IDs, in the form sg-xxxxxxxx. Specify the security groups for the VPC that is specified in the Subnets field.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Subnets
nested_items.description: The ID of the subnets in the VPC to which you want to connect your training job or model. For information about the availability of specific instance types, see Supported Instance Types and Availability Zones.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: RoleArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an IAM role that Amazon SageMaker AI can assume to perform tasks on your behalf.

nested_items.name: StoppingCondition
nested_items.description: A time limit for how long the monitoring job is allowed to run before stopping.

nested_items.name: MaxRuntimeInSeconds
nested_items.description: The maximum runtime allowed in seconds.
